item.title: The International Politics of Surplus Capacity: Competition for Market Shares in the World
item.description: Strange, Susan, and Roger Tooze, eds., The International Politics of Surplus Capacity: Competition for Market Shares in the World. London: Allen and Unwin, 1981. This is a collection of 17 essays resulting from a conference held by the International Political Economy Group of the BISA, together with an editorial overview of theoretical approaches to IPE and a conclusion concerning the agreements and differences among the contributors. Writing with Tooze, Strange notes that it is not intended to dispense with the ‘insights’ of the realists, but it is necessary to widen their approach considerably.
